title: TFT Tournament with 25$ Prize today on NA at 19:00 Eastern Time

embed.description: Our Platform hosts multiple free tournaments per week with awesome prizes.Join now!

body:
Hey,

We host a TFT Tournament today at [01:00 GMT +2][19:00 Eastern Time] on our self developed Platform.
It is very easy just Register -> Play for free.
The Server will be NA.

https://tftalents.com/tournaments/iuZ50KXrhId7ehrRDDMI

The Prize Pool will be 25$, you can find more details and rules on the tournament's page.
I hope we see you today, if you have any questions feel free to ask here or on [our Discord](https://discord.gg/3abn4p).

replies.body: Any estimation as to the size?
